Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

9 namespace Kassiopeia
10 {
11  KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields() :
12  fRootElectricField1( NULL ),
13  fRootElectricField2( NULL ),
14  fRootElectricFieldName1( "" ),
15  fRootElectricFieldName2( "" ),
16  fRampingType( rtExponential ),
17  fNumCycles( 1 ),
18  fRampUpDelay( 0. ),
19  fRampDownDelay( 0. ),
20  fRampUpTime( 0. ),
21  fRampDownTime( 0. ),
22  fTimeConstant( 0. ),
23  fTimeScalingFactor( 1. )
24  {
25  }
26  KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields( const KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields& aCopy ) :
27  Kassiopeia::KSComponent(),
28  fRootElectricField1( aCopy.fRootElectricField1 ),
29  fRootElectricField2( aCopy.fRootElectricField2 ),
30  fRootElectricFieldName1( aCopy.fRootElectricFieldName1 ),
31  fRootElectricFieldName2( aCopy.fRootElectricFieldName2 ),
32  fRampingType( aCopy.fRampingType ),
33  fNumCycles( aCopy.fNumCycles ),
34  fRampUpDelay( aCopy.fRampUpDelay ),
35  fRampDownDelay( aCopy.fRampDownDelay ),
36  fRampUpTime( aCopy.fRampUpTime ),
37  fRampDownTime( aCopy.fRampDownTime ),
38  fTimeConstant( aCopy.fTimeConstant ),
39  fTimeScalingFactor( aCopy.fTimeScalingFactor )
40  {
41  }
42  KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields* KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::Clone() const
43  {
44  return new KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields( *this );
45  }

47  {

50  void KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::CalculatePotential( const KThreeVector &aSamplePoint, const double &aSampleTime, double &aTarget )
51  {
52  fRootElectricField1->CalculatePotential( aSamplePoint, aSampleTime, aTarget );
53  double tempTarget = aTarget;
54  fRootElectricField2->CalculatePotential( aSamplePoint, aSampleTime, aTarget );
55 
56  double Modulation = GetModulationFactor( aSampleTime );
57  aTarget = (1 - Modulation) * tempTarget + Modulation * aTarget;
58  fieldmsg_debug( "Ramped electric field <" << GetName() << "> returns U=" << aTarget << " at t=" << aSampleTime << eom );
59  }
60 
61  void KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::CalculateField( const KThreeVector &aSamplePoint, const double &aSampleTime, KThreeVector &aTarget )
62  {
63  fRootElectricField1->CalculateField( aSamplePoint, aSampleTime, aTarget );
64  KThreeVector tempTarget = aTarget;
65  fRootElectricField2->CalculateField( aSamplePoint, aSampleTime, aTarget );
66 
67  double Modulation = GetModulationFactor( aSampleTime );
68  aTarget = (1 - Modulation) * tempTarget + Modulation * aTarget;
69  fieldmsg_debug( "Ramped electric field <" << GetName() << "> returns E=" << aTarget << " at t=" << aSampleTime << eom );
70  }
71 
72  double KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::GetModulationFactor( const double &aTime )
73  {
74  double tLength = fRampUpDelay + fRampUpTime + fRampDownDelay + fRampDownTime;
75 
76  double tTime = aTime;
77  int tCycle = (int)floor( tTime / tLength );
78  if ( tCycle < fNumCycles )
79  tTime -= tCycle * tLength;
80  tTime *= fTimeScalingFactor;
81 
82  double tUp = fRampUpDelay * fTimeScalingFactor;
83  double tHigh = tUp + fRampUpTime * fTimeScalingFactor;
84  double tDown = tHigh + fRampDownDelay * fTimeScalingFactor;
85  double tLow = tDown + fRampDownTime * fTimeScalingFactor;
86  double tOmega = 2.*M_PI/tLength;
87 
88  double Field = 0.;
89  switch( fRampingType )
90  {
91  case rtLinear :
92  if (tTime >= tLow)
93  Field = 0.;
94  else if (tTime >= tDown)
95  Field = (1. - ((tTime - tDown) / fRampDownTime));
96  else if (tTime >= tHigh)
97  Field = 1.;
98  else if (tTime >= tUp)
99  Field = ((tTime - tUp) / fRampUpTime);
100  break;
101 
102  case rtExponential :
103  if (tTime >= tLow)
104  Field = 0.;
105  else if (tTime >= tDown)
106  {
107  Field = exp( -(tTime - tDown) / fTimeConstant );
108  }
109  else if (tTime >= tHigh)
110  Field = 1.;
111  else if (tTime >= tUp)
112  Field = 1. - exp( -(tTime - tUp) / fTimeConstant );
113  break;
114 
115  case rtSinus :
116  if (tTime >= tUp)
117  Field = 0.5 + 0.5 * sin(tTime * tOmega);
118  break;
119 
120  case rtSquare :
121  if (tTime >= tDown)
122  Field = 0.;
123  else if (tTime >= tUp)
124  Field = 1.;
125  break;
126 
127  default :
128  fieldmsg( eError ) << "Specified ramping type is not implemented" << eom;
129  break;
130  }
131 
132  fieldmsg_debug( "Ramped electric field <" << GetName() << "> uses modulation factor " << Field << " at t=" << tTime << eom );
133  return Field;
134  }
135 
136  void KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::InitializeComponent()
137  {
138  fieldmsg_debug( "Initializing first root electric field <" << fRootElectricFieldName1 << "> from ramped electric field <" << GetName() << ">" << eom );
139  fieldmsg_debug( "Initializing second root electric field <" << fRootElectricFieldName2 << "> from ramped electric field <" << GetName() << ">" << eom );
140  fRootElectricField1 = katrin::KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSElectricField >( fRootElectricFieldName1 );
141  fRootElectricField2 = katrin::KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSElectricField >( fRootElectricFieldName2 );
142  if (! fRootElectricField1)
143  {
144  fieldmsg( eError ) << "Ramped electric field <" << GetName() << "> can't find root electric field <" << fRootElectricFieldName1 << ">!" << eom;
145  }
146  if (! fRootElectricField2)
147  {
148  fieldmsg( eError ) << "Ramped electric field <" << GetName() << "> can't find root electric field <" << fRootElectricFieldName2 << ">!" << eom;
149  }
150 
151  fieldmsg_assert( fNumCycles, > 0 )
152  fieldmsg_assert( fTimeScalingFactor, > 0. )
153  fieldmsg_assert( fRampUpTime, >= 0. )
154  fieldmsg_assert( fRampUpDelay, >= 0. )
155  fieldmsg_assert( fRampDownTime, >= 0. )
156  fieldmsg_assert( fRampDownDelay, >= 0. )
157  if ( fRampingType == rtExponential )
158  {
159  fieldmsg_assert( fTimeConstant, > 0. )
160  }
161 
162  fRootElectricField1->Initialize();
163  fRootElectricField2->Initialize();
164  }
165 
166  void KSFieldElectricRamped2Fields::DeinitializeComponent()
167  {
168  fRootElectricField1->Deinitialize();
169  fRootElectricField1->Deinitialize();
170  }
171 
172 }
